# Get Your Business Online

This website provides professional web development services primarily targeting local businesses looking to establish or enhance their online presence. With a focus on delivering high-quality, fast, and affordable solutions, it offers a range of services from WordPress sites to custom web applications, accompanied by personalized support and transparent pricing.

## About My Work

This section outlines the straightforward process used to get clients' businesses online quickly and professionally. It features a four-step approach:

1. **Discovery Call**: A brief chat to discuss business goals and website needs.
2. **Content & Design**: Building the site based on client-provided content with an opportunity for one round of revisions.
3. **Launch**: The website goes live within five business days, handling all technical aspects.
4. **Ongoing Support**: Clients receive 30 days of support after launch, with continued availability for questions.

**Key Expectations:**
- **No Jargon**: Clear communication without technical complexity.
- **Fixed Pricing**: Transparent costs without hidden fees.
- **Real Experience**: Over 27 years in tech, with significant web development expertise.

## Services

This section highlights the various services offered, each tailored to meet different client needs, with a key emphasis on transparency and no hidden fees.

### $500 WordPress Sites
- Launched within 5 business days.
- Mobile-friendly design with basic SEO.
- Includes contact form, one round of revisions, and 30 days of post-launch support.

### Custom Web Applications
- Tailored solutions to fit unique business needs.
- Built with modern tech stacks.
- Includes ongoing maintenance and training.

### Team Growth Accelerator
- Mentorship for development teams.
- Focus on code review and modern web practices.

## Free Website Audit

Users can enter their website URL to receive a health check on performance, SEO, security, and accessibility within 30 seconds. The service is aimed at helping businesses identify areas for improvement and enhancing their online presence.

## Contact

This section offers various ways for potential clients to get in touch regarding their projects. 

### Get in Touch
- **Send a Message**: Users can fill out a form to describe their project.
- **Schedule a Call**: An option for a quick 15-minute discovery call.
- **Other Contact Methods**:
  - Email: [jon@jpgerton.com](mailto:jon@jpgerton.com)
  - GitHub: [@jgerton](https://github.com/jgerton)
  - LinkedIn: [Jon Gerton](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jon-gerton-8009a9393/)

## Thank You Page

After a client submits a message, they receive a confirmation and an outline of what to expect next. This includes reviewing the project details, receiving a response, and possibly scheduling a call to discuss the project further. Clients are also encouraged to check out recent work outputs.

## Admin Pages

Certain backend pages are included but do not contain relevant public information and are thus not discussed in detail.

---

This structure aims to provide clarity on the offerings of the site while emphasizing user engagement through calls to action.
